name: Corridor of Death: Alluring Darkness
description:
You play as an ordinary guy who has nightmares at night about a long and dark corridor. These nightmares won't just leave him alone.

The game has 2 times improved graphics of the Unity engine.

There is voice acting.

Realistic first-person view in cut-scenes.

Dark atmosphere of despair and hopelessness.

The game was created by 3 people. Each of them contributed in their own way.

Many thanks to the people who played this game! And tell your friends about it!
